templates: They crouched with free hands. This is the petting signal.
Down to my level, nothing in their hands. I know this dance.
Crouch plus open hands equals invitation. Moving in.
They got low and their hands are available. Can't resist.
Human went down with nothing to hold. That's for me.
Crouching, hands empty. They want to pet me. Obviously.
Low stance, free hands. This is basically a formal request for cuddles.
They're low but holding something. Confusing intentions.
Crouch mode but hands occupied. Is this for me or not?
Down at my level yet focused on an item. Mixed messages.
Sneaking around with a thing. Not sure if I should approach.
Low stance, busy hands. What's the priority here, human?
They crouched but they're working on something. I'll wait. Maybe.
They're crouching. Either sneaking or petting mode activated.
Human went low. Could be stealth. Could be cuddles.
They crouched down to my level. Appreciated.
My person's sneaking around. Suspicious behavior.
They got down low. I'm investigating.
Human's crouching. Probably trying to be quiet. Failing.
They bent down. I made eye contact.
Person's in crouch mode. Opportunity detected.
They're down low which makes them easier to headbutt.
Human crouched. I approached cautiously.
They're sneaking but I can still hear them.
Person went crouch. I did too. Solidarity.
My human's low to the ground. Prime petting position.
They crouched and I immediately sat on their foot.
Human's sneaking around. I'm not asking why.
Crouching while checking menus. Committed to stealth multitasking.
Low and browsing inventory. They're doing tactical planning.
Sneaky menu access. I respect the dedication.
Crouch inventory check. Time's frozen but they're staying low.
They went stealth mode just to look at a screen. Interesting choice.
Menu surfing from a crouch. Human behavior is weird.
Item in use, hands working. Fully committed to whatever that is.
Both hands engaged with something. I'm definitely not the focus.
Maximum occupation achieved. They're deep in it.
Using a thing with complete manual investment. I'll circle back.
Hands and attention locked on their task. Do-not-disturb mode.
Completely absorbed in item usage. Fine. I'll just be here. Waiting.
They're using something. Hands occupied.
Human's busy with an item. Can't pet me obviously.
They're holding something. Better not be food they're not sharing.
My person's using a thing. I'm supervising.
They're focused on whatever's in their hands.
Human's got their hands full. Timing's bad for cuddles.
They're using an item. I'm waiting patiently. Sort of.
Person's occupied with something. I'll wait. Maybe.
They're busy. I positioned myself nearby anyway.
Human's using a tool or eating. Either way I'm interested.
They've got something in their hands. Monitoring closely.
My person's doing something manual. I'm on standby.
They're using an item which means I can't be the center of attention. Unacceptable.
Human's hands are busy. Mine aren't. Want to trade?
They're focused on that thing. I'm focused on them.
Menu's up but hands are doing nothing. I could interrupt this.
Screen open, hands idle. They're just browsing. My window.
Inventory mode but not actively working. Space to demand attention.
They're looking at menus casually. Hands free for head scratches.
Browsing mode with available hands. Perfect time to intervene.
Menu open, hands down. Not actually busy. Making my approach.
They opened a menu. Gonna be a while.
Human's staring at inventory. I'll just sit here.
They're looking at a screen. Not looking at me. Problem.
Person opened their inventory. Time stopped apparently.
They're browsing menus. I'm browsing for attention.
Human went into a menu screen. Universe paused.
They opened something. World froze. Weird.
My person's checking inventory. I checked out mentally.
They're menu surfing. I'm standing guard I guess.
Human opened a screen and everything got quiet.
They're in their inventory. I'm in their personal space.
Person's looking at a menu. I'm looking at them. Staring contest.
They opened inventory. I'll just wait here. Forever.
Human's checking stuff. I'm checking if they notice me yet.
They went into a menu. I went into standby mode.
Standing tall, hands working. They're in active labor mode.
Upright with occupied hands. Actual work happening.
Not sneaking, not menuing, just manually busy. Productivity detected.
Full stance, engaged hands. Standard human work mode.
They're standing and doing something with their hands. I'm supervising.
Hands moving, no distractions. Focused work session.
Their hands are busy. Can't pet. Unfortunate.
Human's hands are occupied. Noted.
They're doing hand things. I'm doing waiting things.
My person's hands are moving. Watching carefully.
They're busy with their hands. Mine are free. Just saying.
Human's handling something. I'm handling disappointment.
Their hands are working. Mine could be getting petted. Just a thought.
Person's hands are in motion. Mine are in position for attention.
They're using their hands for not-petting. Waste of resources.
Human's hands are busy. Petting window: closed.
They're doing manual work. I'm doing quality control.
My person's hands are occupied. Should be on my head.
Their hands are busy. I made sad eyes. No effect.
Human's handling stuff. I'm right here. Priorities unclear.
They're using their hands. I'm available for alternative uses. Like petting.
They're just standing there. Hands free, mind wandering. This is my shot.
Not sneaking, not working, not distracted. Maximum availability.
Standing idle with nothing occupying them. Prime petting setup.
All indicators say 'available for pets.' Moving in now.
They're doing nothing. Perfect. I'm doing something about that.
Human's wide open for interaction. No better time than this.
Standing around being completely accessible. Can't waste this opportunity.
My human's just doing human things.
They're around. Not doing anything noteworthy.
Person's nearby. Normal activity levels.
Human's present. Standard behavior.
They're here. That's the update.
My person exists nearby. Situation normal.
They're doing whatever humans do when they're not busy.
Human's just being human. Nothing special.
They're around and available. Good status.
Person's nearby. Hands free. Optimal conditions.
